Structured data

Captions

Captions

Flag of Curaçao
Bandera de Curazao
Флаг Кюрасао, одной из четырех государств федерации Королевства Нидерландов
Quốc kỳ Curaçao
Bandiera curaçao
Curaçaos flagga
Curaçao bayrağı, orta xəttin biraz altındakı üfüqi sarı zolaqlı və kantondakı iki ağ, beşguşəli ulduzlu mavi bir sahədir. Həndəsə və rənglər Dünyanın bayraqlarındakı təsvirə görədir

Summary[edit]

DescriptionFlag of Curaçao.svg The flag of Curaçao is a blue field with a horizontal yellow stripe slightly below the midline and two white, five-pointed stars in the canton. The geometry and colors are according to the description at Flags of the World.
Source Flags of the World.
Author Original: Unknown Vector: David Benbennick
SVG development
InfoField
 The SVG code is valid. This flag was created with a text editor.

Public domainPublic domainfalsefalse
This logo image consists only of simple geometric shapes or text. It does not meet the threshold of originality needed for copyright protection, and is therefore in the public domain. Although it is free of copyright restrictions, this image may still be subject to other restrictions. See WP:PD#Fonts and typefaces or Template talk:PD-textlogo for more information.
This image shows a flag, a coat of arms, a seal or some other official insignia. The use of such symbols is restricted in many countries. These restrictions are independent of the copyright status.
